'''''From the Abyss's Heart I Stab At Thee''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[All-Devouring Narwhal]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The achievement's title is a reference to the 1851 novel {{w|Moby-Dick}}, where the protagonist Ahab curses Moby-Dick as the titular whale bests him: "<i>Towards thee I roll, thou all-destroying but unconquering whale; to the last I grapple with thee; from hell’s heart I stab at thee; for hate’s sake I spit my last breath at thee.</i>"
